Big Payette Sequin Rectangle Tablecloth

The New Design and the killer look for your table is in!! Bring home our luxury linens with our Payette Sequin Tablecloths! This glittery Payette tablecloth with is specially designed and crafted to make your guests and bystanders awestruck at your opulence, generosity and grandeur. 

Deluxe Fabric

This exclusive sequin tablecloth is made from the deluxe fabric and exhibit glorious and catchy appeal. This startling tablecloth is perfect to greet the guests at glance with its outstanding shine and elegance. 

Shimmery Big Sequins

It will surely satisfy the visual craving of the guests at the parties. Payette sequin has an irrefutable charm and throughout detail of sequins. Shimmery Big Sequins are brilliantly stitched to ensure no piece of the cloth is left out.

 

Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
  • Material: Sequin on Mesh Base
  • Color: Iridescent
  • Size: 60"x102"
  • Sequin Size: 19mm
  • How to Care:  Do not dry clean or machine wash. Wipe with a soft damp cloth.
  • For Tablecloth only, Decorations not included
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

Intricately crafted from the deluxe fabric with shimmery sequin rounds that are brilliantly stitched to ensure no piece of the cloth is left out. The surreal shimmer and glimmer of these square tablecloths make them a perfect choice for bridal tables, cake tables, guest tables, dessert tables, gift tables, and VIP Guest Table.

For a truly voguish presentation, pair these with our other sequin accented accessories like Sequined Table Runners, Table Napkins, Table Overlays, Chair Covers, Chair Sashes, Chair Caps, Favor Bags, Flowers, Backdrops, Drapes, Aisle Runners, and more!

Additional Information:

  • Material : Glistening round sequins atop fabric
  • Measurements : 54" x 54"
  • How to Care : Dry clean only.
  • Edges are Hemmed.
  • Uses : Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
